results.name: Floor((n^2+7n-23)/14).
comment: This is conjectured to be the value of the dominance number of the triangle grid graph for n >= 14 - see A251419.
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Stan Wagon, Graph Theory Problems from Hexagonal and Traditional Chess, The College Mathematics Journal, Vol. 45, No. 4, September 2014 pp. 278-287.
